com.chipsandwaycool.entity

类 MadnessDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chipsandwaycool.entity.MadnessDatabase

  • public class MadnessDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an object for initializing the data store (Derby) and doling out connections to it. It needs to be initialized before the singleton 'GetInstance()' method can be called.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      Return a database connection, or null if none can be produced.
      static MadnessDatabase GetInstance()
      Return the singleton instance of this database manager class.
      static void Initialize(java.lang.String dataDirectory, java.lang.String databaseURL, boolean rebuildDatabase)
      Initialize this database singleton for use.
      void shutDown()
      Shut down my database.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • Initialize

        public static void Initialize(java.lang.String dataDirectory,
                              java.lang.String databaseURL,
                              boolean rebuildDatabase)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Initialize this database singleton for use. Configure the given root database directory (for Derby), and use the specified database name. The 'getConnection()' method will create the database as needed. Iff 'rebuildDatabase', then drop and recreate all the tables, with a default set of data. This should normally be needed once only.
        参数:
        dataDirectory - a file-system directory for the database to use
        databaseURL - the database URL for connections
        rebuildDatabase - whether to rebuild all the tables and base data
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • GetInstance

        public static MadnessDatabase GetInstance()
        Return the singleton instance of this database manager class. Remember to call 'Initialize()' before calling this, else a NullPointerException.
        返回:
        the single instance of this class

      • getConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Return a database connection, or null if none can be produced. Report any errors to my ExceptionLogger, if I have one.
        返回:
        a connection to the database
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Shut down my database.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
